page.title: 13The Cost of Success
page.content: As members of a competitive Swimming Club we train for District, National and International Swimming. My brother is an International and I'm a National competitor,and we follow this schedule {Monday} 7am -7.40am(swimming) 7 pm - 9 pm ) {Tuesday} 7.00 am - 7.40 am)Swimming 5.30 pm - 6.30 pm) {Wednesday}7.00 am - 7.40 am) Swimming 7.00 pm - 7.30 pm) gym work 8.00 pm - 9.00 pm) Swimming {Thursday} 5.00 pm - 6.oo pm) Swimming {Friday} 7.00 am - 7.40 am) Swimming {Saturday }9.00 am _ io.00am) gym work io.ooam - 11.00am) swimming {Sunday} 12.20pm - 1.45 pm) swimming. Our training is done in the swimming pool at Cardenden,Auchterderran School and Glenrothes Sports Centre.
